info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:39PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rutherford and central Polk Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 439 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Columbus, or 5 miles southeast of Lake Lure, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rutherfordton, Forest City, Spindale, Lake Lure, Chimney Rock State Park, Green Hill, Mill Spring, Lake Adger, Shingle Hollow and Harris. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
